Description: Green glazed composition shabti of Wedjaypen born of Mehytemhes with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard, crossed hands in relief holding a hoe and an adze, the waist is inscribed with a row of incised Hieroglyphs, the front of the leg section is inscribed with a similar column; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
